name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James M. JACKSON, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James M. JACKSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Donald P. Monti, William G. Sutter, Jr., Robert S. Adams, Pittsburgh, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
359 A.2d 366
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James M. JACKSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1976.
Decided July 6, 1976.
Donald P. Monti, William G. Sutter, Jr., Robert S. Adams, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Charles W. Johns, Asst. Dist. Attys., L. R. Pauliek, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before Jones, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
